attributes.action: to intervene with royal mail. (as was done with the banking industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Save our postal service, from the pension deficit, from competitiors cherry picking the best bits of the business, from corporate managers cutting the service to the bones, and save a hard working and dedicated work force from joining the ever increasing dole quenue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
